xwikidoc.name: IDEPageSuggest
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content: #set($ok = $response.setContentType("text/xml")) #set($input = $request.get("input").toLowerCase()) #set($sql = "where lower(doc.fullName) like '%${input}%' order by doc.date desc") #set($queryResult = $xwiki.searchDocuments($sql, 30, 0)) #set($results = $queryResult.toArray()) <results type="8"> #foreach($res in $results) #set($itemdoc = $xwiki.getDocument($res)) #set($itemurl = $xwiki.getDocument($res).getExternalURL("view")) <rs id="$velocityCount" info="$escapetool.xml($itemurl)">$res (view)</rs> #set($itemurl = $xwiki.getDocument($res).getExternalURL("edit", "editor=wiki")) <rs id="$velocityCount" info="$escapetool.xml($itemurl)">$res (edit wiki)</rs> #set($itemurl = $xwiki.getDocument($res).getExternalURL("edit", "editor=wysiwyg")) <rs id="$velocityCount" info="$escapetool.xml($itemurl)">$res (edit wysiwyg)</rs> #set($itemurl = $xwiki.getDocument($res).getExternalURL("edit", "editor=object")) <rs id="$velocityCount" info="$escapetool.xml($itemurl)">$res (object)</rs> #set($itemurl = $xwiki.getDocument($res).getExternalURL("edit", "editor=class")) <rs id="$velocityCount" info="$escapetool.xml($itemurl)">$res (class)</rs> #end </results>
